item.title: 特朗普政府与英特尔商谈入股 10
item.description: 据一位白宫官员和其他熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府正在讨论入股英特尔公司约 10%的股份，此举可能使美国成为这家陷入困境的芯片制造商的最大股东。【原文：The Trump administration is in discussions to take a stake of about 10% in Intel Corp., according to a White House official and other people familiar with the matter, in a move that could see the US become the beleaguered chipmaker’s largest shareholder.】

item.title: 结束社会主义统治使玻利维亚债券升至逾两年高点
item.description: 在周末的选举巩固了新政府进行重大自由市场改革的可能性之后，玻利维亚的美元债券周一涨至两年多来的最高点。【原文：Bolivia’s dollar bonds rallied Monday to the highest in over two years after the weekend’s election cemented the chances of significant free-market reforms under a new government.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔鲍威尔重要讲话前国债跌势扩大
item.description: 美国国债连续第三天下滑，因为交易员们将焦点转向了本周备受期待的杰罗姆-鲍威尔的讲话，以寻找美联储将采取何种利率的信号。【原文：US Treasuries slipped for a third day as traders shift focus to a highly anticipated speech this week from Jerome Powell for signals on where the Federal Reserve will take interest rates.】

item.title: 维利兹退休后，桑科公司任命拉戈斯接管燃料贸易业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，随着维罗妮卡-维利兹（Veronica Veliz）退休，桑科能源公司（Suncor Energy Inc.【原文：Suncor Energy Inc. is tapping Pedro Lagos to trade fuels from the company’s four refineries as Veronica Veliz retires, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 小米 1,200 亿美元的收益因智能手机增长放缓而受到质疑
item.description: 过去一年，小米公司因大力发展电动汽车而市值大涨 1200 亿美元，投资者正焦急地等待着小米公司的财报。【原文：Investors anxiously await an earnings report from Xiaomi Corp., following a rally that has driven its market value up $120 billion in the past year on excitement over its push into electric vehicles.】

item.title: 新奥姆滑雪胜地令沙特王子的 1.5 万亿美元计划捉襟见肘
item.description:
特罗耶纳被指定为 2029 年亚洲冬季运动会的举办地。但由于该地区降雪量很少，这对 MBS 的旗舰项目来说是一个巨大的挑战

。【原文：

Trojena is designated to host the 2029 Asian Winter Games. But set in a region with little snowfall, it’s emerging as a great challenge to MBS’s flagship project

】

item.title: 据报道，巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）有意进行投资，Raízen 公司股价创下历史最大涨幅
item.description: 据《O Globo》报报道，国家控制的石油生产商巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）正在考虑对这家糖和乙醇生产商进行投资，Raízen SA 公司的股票在周一飙升，创下有记录以来的最大盘中涨幅。【原文：Shares of Raízen SA soared on Monday, posting their biggest intra-day gain on record, after the newspaper O Globo reported that state-controlled oil producer Petrobras is considering investing in the sugar and ethanol producer.】

item.title: 英国首席执行官加薪，削弱了美国上市的主要吸引力
item.description: 英国最大公司驻英国高管的薪酬正在上涨，缩小了与美国同行的薪酬差距，而这正是导致公司纷纷撤离伦敦的原因之一。【原文：Compensation for UK-based executives at the country’s largest firms is rising, narrowing a pay gap with US peers that has contributed to an exodus of companies from London.】

item.title: 英国《卫报》称英国考虑放弃印花税改征新房产税
item.description: 据英国《卫报》报道，财政部正在研究取代印花税的可能性，并对出售价值超过 50 万英镑（67.6 万美元）的英国房屋征收新税。【原文：The Treasury is examining the possibility of replacing stamp duty and introducing a new tax on the sale of UK homes worth more than £500,000 ($676,000), according to the Guardian.】

item.title: 乌克兰称再次袭击俄罗斯石油管道系统
item.description: 乌克兰说，它于周一对俄罗斯的德鲁日巴石油管道系统发动了新一轮袭击，切断了一条对中欧部分地区原油供应非常重要的通道。【原文：Ukraine said it carried out a fresh attack on Russia’s Druzhba oil pipeline system on Monday and halted a conduit that’s important for crude supply to parts of central Europe.】

item.title: 星链公司敦促修改南非黑人所有权规则
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）敦促南非考虑为希望在非洲最大经济体开展业务的电信公司制定黑人所有权规则的替代方案。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX urged South Africa to consider an alternative to Black ownership rules for telecom companies that want to operate in Africa’s largest economy.】

item.title: 石油价格波动，焦点转向泽伦斯基与特朗普的会晤
item.description: 交易员们在等待唐纳德-特朗普总统与沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统的会晤，乌克兰领导人面临着美国要求其同意向俄罗斯割让领土的压力。【原文：Oil swung between gains and losses as traders awaited a meeting between Presidents Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelenskiy, with the Ukrainian leader facing US pressure to agree to ceding territory to Russia.】

item.title: 老虎环球七月涨幅仍落后于其他 "小熊
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，老虎环球管理公司（Tiger Global Management）7 月份的业绩增长了 2.8%，提升了全年业绩，但仍落后于朱利安-罗伯逊（Julian Robertson）公司的其他校友。【原文：Tiger Global Management advanced 2.8% in July, boosting its performance for the year but still putting it behind other alumni of Julian Robertson’s firm, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 慕尼黑大学长期分析师汤姆-多伊（Tom Doe）退出其创办的公司
item.description: Tom Doe 是研究公司 Municipal Market Analytics 的创始人，他正在从自己长达数十年的国家和地方政府债务市场分析职业生涯中后退一步。【原文：Tom Doe, founder of research firm Municipal Market Analytics, is taking a step back from his decades-long career analyzing the state and local-government debt market.】

item.title: 英国 30 年期通胀挂钩收益率创 1998 年以来新高
item.description: 与通胀挂钩的长期英国政府债券的收益率超过了三年前金边债券市场崩溃时的高点，反映出对此类债务的需求正在发生转移。【原文：The yield on long-dated inflation-linked UK government bonds surpassed the highs seen during the gilt-market meltdown three years ago, reflecting an ongoing shift in demand away from such debt.】

item.title: 瑞士并购交易激增，欧洲其他国家望尘莫及
item.description: 瑞士的并购案激增了五倍多，超过了大多数欧洲同行，这给银行家们带来了今年获得丰厚回报的希望。【原文：Switzerland is seeing a more than fivefold surge in mergers and acquisitions that’s outpaced most of its European peers, giving bankers hopes for a lucrative payout this year.】

item.title: 印度多年来最大幅度减税计划刺激汽车需求
item.description: 印度纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的政府正寻求刺激消费需求，熟悉内情的人士称，印度正寻求将小型汽车的地方税削减至 18%，而高档汽车的税率则可能降低至 40%。【原文：India is looking to slash a local tax on small cars to 18% while levies on premium cars may be pared to 40%, people familiar with the matter said, as the Narendra Modi-led government seeks to bolster consumption demand.】

item.title: 法国电力公司将因河流水位低而削减法国北部的核电产量
item.description: 由于默兹河水位较浅，法国电力公司本周可能会削减该国北部地区的核电生产。【原文：Electricite de France SA will likely cut nuclear power production in northern parts of the country this week because of shallow waters on the Meuse River.】

item.title: 加拿大房屋开工量创 2022 年以来最高水平
item.description: 随着加拿大最大省份和最东部省份的公寓、联排别墅和共管公寓建设继续增加，加拿大的住房开工率跃升至近三年来的最高水平。【原文：Canada’s housing starts jumped to the highest level in nearly three years as construction on apartments, townhouses and condominiums in the country’s largest and easternmost provinces continued to rise.】

item.title: 社交媒体上的丑陋玉米照片显示美国创纪录作物面临的风险
item.description: 美国政府预测今年的玉米收成将创历史新高，但社交媒体上迅速传播的丑陋植株图片引发了人们对即将到来的收成的担忧。【原文：The US government is forecasting a record corn crop this year, but pictures of ugly-looking plants spreading fast through social media have triggered concern about the upcoming harvest.】

item.title: 购房者缺乏动力，美国住宅建筑商情绪回落
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商的信心在本月下降至 2022 年以来的最低水平，这迫使企业更加倚重激励措施，以应对高房贷利率并说服缺乏动力的购房者。【原文：US homebuilder confidence fell this month to match the lowest level since 2022, forcing firms to lean more heavily on incentives to counter high mortgage rates and persuade unmotivated buyers.】

item.title: 埃及将中央银行行长阿卜杜拉的任期延长至第四年
item.description: 在北非国家摆脱数十年来最严重的货币紧缩之际，埃及将哈桑-阿卜杜拉（Hassan Abdalla）对央行的领导权延长至第四年，向外国固定收益投资者发出了连续性的信号。【原文：Egypt extended Hassan Abdalla’s leadership of the central bank into a fourth year, sending a signal of continuity to foreign fixed-income investors as the North African nation emerges from its worst currency crunch in decades.】

item.title: 特朗普与泽伦斯基会晤前美国股市保持稳定，零售业盈利情况良好
item.description: 周一开盘后，美国股市在白宫召开乌克兰战争问题会议之前持稳，交易员们也在为本周大量零售业财报和美联储座谈会做准备。【原文：US equities were steady after Monday’s open before a White House meeting on the war in Ukraine and as traders brace for a deluge of retail earnings reports and a Federal Reserve symposium this week.】

item.title: 印度证券交易委员会建议放宽大型 IPO 的最低股票发售规模
item.description: 根据周一发布的一份咨询文件，印度市场监管机构 SEBI 建议降低公司在进行大型 IPO 时必须向公众出售的最低股份比例，并修订满足最低公众持股比例要求的时间表。【原文：India’s markets regulator SEBI has proposed reducing the minimum percentage of shares that a company must sell to the public for large IPOs as well as amended timeline to meet minimum public shareholding requirements, according to a consultation paper Monday.】

item.title: 礼来利用高等级债券市场，发行罕见的 40 年期债券
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. is tapping the US investment-grade debt market with a deal that’s expected to include a 40-year bond, a rarity in a world characterized by high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 康卡斯特的 MSNBC 将在 Versant 分拆后更名为 MS NOW
item.description: 随着康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）旗下的 NBCUniversal 将其部分媒体品牌分拆为一家名为 Versant 的独立公司，政治新闻网络 MSNBC 正准备更名。【原文：Political news network MSNBC is preparing to change its name as Comcast Corp.’s NBCUniversal spins off some of its media brands into a separate company called Versant.】

item.title: 以太坊大力支持者释放数十亿资金进军华尔街
item.description: 上周，在曼哈顿第 42 街西普里阿尼酒店（Cipriani 42nd Street）的大银行大厅里，加密货币的拥护者们聚集在大理石圆柱和吊灯下，宣告一个新的金融时代的到来；这个时代远远超越了比特币。【原文：In the grand banking hall of Cipriani 42nd Street in Manhattan last week, crypto advocates gathered beneath marble columns and chandeliers to declare the arrival of a new financial era — one that goes way beyond Bitcoin.】

item.title: 肯尼亚考虑从侨民债券中筹集多达 5 亿美元资金
item.description: 肯尼亚希望通过向居住在国外的公民借款来缓解公共财政的紧张状况，计划发行 2.5 亿至 5 亿美元的所谓侨民债券。【原文：Kenya, which wants to ease tight public finances by borrowing from citizens living abroad, plans to get the ball rolling with a so-called diaspora bond of between $250 million and $500 million.】

item.title: 全球不确定性加剧，智利经济增长放缓
item.description: 由于高失业率和全球不确定性等不利因素影响了拉丁美洲最富裕国家之一智利的经济活动，智利经济在 4 月至 6 月期间出现了季度性下滑。【原文：Chile’s economy down-shifted on quarterly basis in the April-June period as headwinds including high unemployment and global uncertainty tempered activity in one of Latin America’s richest nations.】

item.title: 莫迪称 "朋友 "普京分享了特朗普会晤的收获
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）说，他接到了 "朋友 "弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）总统的电话，普京分享了他对最近在阿拉斯加与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会晤的见解，这是另一个信号，表明尽管受到华盛顿方面的反弹，新德里与莫斯科之间的关系依然牢固。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi said he received a phone call from his “friend” President Vladimir Putin, who shared his insights on a recent meeting with US President Donald Trump in Alaska, in another signal that ties between New Delhi and Moscow remain strong despite backlash from Washington.】
